00016 class Exception : public std::exception
00017 {
00018 public:
00019   Exception(const QString & reason = "") : reason(reason.toUtf8().data()) {}
00020   Exception(const std::string & reason = "") : reason(reason) {}
00021   virtual ~Exception() throw() {}
00022 
00023   const char * what() const throw() { return reason.c_str(); }
00024 
00025 private:
00026   std::string reason;
00027 };

00029 class FatalException : public Exception
00030 {
00031 public:
00032     FatalException(const std::string & s) : Exception(s) {}
00033     FatalException(const QString & s) : Exception(s) {}
00034 };

00036 static inline QString TmpPath()
00037 {
00038     static QString tmp = "";
00039     if (!tmp.length()) {
00040 #if defined(Q_OS_WIN)
00041         char buf[256];    
00042         GetTempPathA(sizeof(buf), buf);
00043         buf[sizeof(buf)-1] = 0;
00044         tmp = buf;
00045 #else
00046         tmp = "/tmp/";
00047 #endif
00048     }
00049     return tmp;    
00050 }
00051 
00052 #endif
